name: artist_singles
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool spotify_data.
Tool description: Spotify Data
API description: Fetches singles of an artist from the Spotify API using the provided artist ID.

is_id.description: The Spotify artist ID. Default is '2w9zwq3AktTeYYMuhMjju8'.

offset.description: The index of the first single to return. Default is '0'.

limit.description: The maximum number of singles to return. Default is '20'.
